metadata.title: CVE-2016-2175 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Apache PDFBox before 1.8.12 and 2.x before 2.0.1 does not properly initialize the XML parsers, which allows context-dependent attackers to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted PDF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-2175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.12-1').
